sentences.sContent: It’s limited only by your ingenuity!
sentences.sCn: 被束缚的仅仅是你的独创性！

sentences.sContent: Sitting with my IV drip, I like to think about all the human labour and ingenuity that come together in this medical moment.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sitting with my IV drip, I like to think about all the human labour and ingenuity that come together in this medical moment.
sentences.sCn: 坐在那里进行着静脉点滴，我想到了所有的人类劳动和独创性在这一时刻汇聚到了一起。

synos.tran: 心灵手巧，独创性；精巧；精巧的装置

words.tran: 有独创性的；机灵的，精制的；心灵手巧的
